weep.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to cry, especially because you feel very sad
weep.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He wept bitterly (=cried a lot) when it was time for us to leave.
She wept for the loss of her mother.
weep.translation[0].definitions[0].note_: In everyday English, people usually say cry rather than weep:
She was crying all the way through the movie.
weep.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if a wound weeps, liquid comes out of it
